name: test_negative_update_task
description: Generates random task ID and to access it with update request, validate to receive expected error message and code

steps.name: Update task by ID 927 with new data None, expected status code: 401

Create url with base url and endpoint: /task/927
Result URL: https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/927
Send PUT request to https://api.clickup.com/api/v2/task/927 with json=None and data=None, expected status code 401
